location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to John Kaye, Civil Auditor, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is responding to an audit of the account disbursements for the Bushire Residency between June and July 1811. It includes explanations for a number of payments, which include pension payments and advances made to Lieutenant Livingston.Attached to the letter is a list of pension payments to an unnamed individual. It is not certain whether or not this list is related to pension payments discussed in the letter.
